definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: The format of those pixels can differ, from video card to video card.
sentences.chinese: 象素點的格式會因顯卡的不同而不同。

sentences.english: I wanted a better graphics card, so I bought it.
sentences.chinese: 我想要更好的顯卡，我也買了。
這款顯卡性價比很高，值的購買。

sentences.english: You will want to get an integrated graphics card with your laptop.
sentences.chinese: 你會想要一個集成顯卡的筆記本。

sentences.english: If it does, make a good graphics card a consideration when choosing a machine.
sentences.chinese: 如果是這樣，在選擇機器的時候應該考慮好的顯卡。

sentences.english: Also check the graphics card's supported resolutions.
sentences.chinese: 還需要檢查顯卡支持的分辨率。

sentences.english: One of the new features of the Intel chips is an integrated graphics processor.
sentences.chinese: 這款英特爾處理器有一個新特性，集成了顯卡。

sentences.english: Allows users to troubleshoot problematic watercooled graphics cards without the hassle of dismantling their water-Loop.
sentences.chinese: 允許用戶解決問題的水冷顯卡的麻煩拆除其水環。

sentences.english: If the computer has a video card, try switching the stock video card fan for a different fan.
sentences.chinese: 如果電腦有顯卡，試着用另一個風扇換掉原裝風扇。

sentences.english: Why not connect a small chassis fan or--better yet--an old GPU fan to the power supply?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不接上一個小風扇或是使用舊的顯卡風扇呢？

sentences.english: Integrated graphics have been maligned in the past as being slow.
sentences.chinese: 過去，人們一直認爲集成顯卡速度很慢。

sentences.english: My graphics card fan is bust.
sentences.chinese: 這是我顯卡風扇的運轉情況。

sentences.english: Integrated video cards have one disadvantage, they are notas powerful as video cards.
sentences.chinese: 集成顯卡有一個缺點，它們沒有獨立顯卡那樣強大。

sentences.english: Integrated video cards have one disadvantage, they are notas powerful as video cards.
sentences.chinese: 集成顯卡有一個缺點，它們沒有獨立顯卡那樣強大。

sentences.english: Choose your video card from the list presented.
sentences.chinese: 從顯示的列表中選擇您的顯卡。

definition: CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: pattern matching (puzzle game)/matching (type of test question in which presented items are to be paired up)
